title: Framed Data
text: Engineer a user-facing data visualization dashboard displaying machine learning data and statistics with Clojure and ClojureScript
Maximize user understanding of complex machine learning data
Took on product management and design of a customer-facing data overview page displaying the most important machine learning data and statistics to users
Programmed front-end data visualizations and various statistical analyses on the back-end for the data overview page
Built an internal dashboard for evaluating accuracy of machine learning predictions with D3.js and ClojureScript

title: WebAction
text: First member of front-end team. Made several technology choices for the front-end: D3.js, Backbone.js, Require.js, LESS, Grunt.js
Architected, designed, and programmed a user-customizable data visualization dashboard displaying large quantities of data in real-time
Optimized front-end codebase to efficiently parse large quantities of data client-side
Built a front-end build process using Grunt.js

title: Hackbright Academy
text: Hackbright is a 10 week, full-time intensive Python and web development fellowship
Learned Python, Django, Flask, SQL, and front-end technologies

Built applications such as a movie rating prediction system implementing Pearson's r, K-nearest neighbor, and Euclidean distance, a to-do list using Flask, and a program that generates text in the style of a particular author using Markov chains

title: Ranganath Lab, UC Davis
text: Conducted fMRI, EEG, eye-tracking, and behavioral cognitive neuroscience studies
Analyzed experimental data in Python and Matlab and administered server system
